Articles.Content:
Well, Call of duty Ghost multiplayer is a disappointment for me. I just ad to compare it to Kerbal Space Programs for one sake!

{lots of text warning}

The budgets,

Cod Ghost cost 120$.

Digital prestige edition ! ( sorry boys loved the Black ops 2 camos )

Kerbal Space Programs cost 22$. (At full price don't remember the price i paid in special sorry !)

But, Lets say 20 Just to get a round number ! That crap... Ooops "game" (not crap maybe something brown not smelling good)

I did buy for x6 the price i paid for KSP. Well that is some Bloody expensive crap !

But my point is, KSP is in ALPHA and its stable, enjoyable, intelligent and probably to ambitious for the BUDGETS they got !

I don't know for a fact how much Infinity Ward made, but i will make an assumption, those mofos probably made, More cash than Ksp will ever make !

For a game that is not stable at all, not intelligent and not ambitious at all. Sorry for the crying boys but i did needed this 1. And do not start me on Single player..

Long story short, keep up the good work ! I specially love the animator! Making a bloody good jobs on those "movies"! ( i can see that hes not cutting corner off )

You know your basics animation Skills.

Thanks, for making a game that i never played yet !

Thanks, to give me nice emotions when i land on the only body i can get to "the mun".

Thanks, for making me "LOL" and wake up all my neighborhood !

Thanks, for the HO **** moment when i just killed "Jeb"

Blo0d
KSP has better graphics.

With your vocabulary we could have guessed which game you were talking about even if you did not mention the title.

Or you are just trolling.
I stopped playing Cod after 2. So i have no opinion on the matter.
Tune in next week when we compare oranges and trombones!

Tune in next week when we compare oranges and trombones!

Oranges have more citrus.
Those Games are piles of money reaming crap. Kerbal is the only way.
Last one I liked was COD 2

Oranges have more citrus.

Depends what you oil your slide with
Working on my English vocabulary, i do need to learn my grammar in English too. I'm born a Frenchies ! its a second language for me !

CoD needs to just... go away. Battlefield 4 is much better, but I hate the mp in these types of games. In both CoD and BF its just people running around like a chicken with its head cut off. Its "Who sees who first wins" mp. Its crap. Im more of a Halo/Unreal guy myself where you have abilities to prevent your death should another player get the jump on you. Its just more fun that way.

But id take KSP over any other game. Every time. No other game has captured me like KSP has. Not since ES:Oblivion.

Edited November 9, 2013 by Motokid600
KSP is a simulation of space travel with little green men, giant rockets, and boulders. CoD: Ghosts is an FPS with guns, blood, and death. You really can't compare the two.
I just saw the title on this forum, came in and read all the other posts....... all I have to say is - KSP IS AMAZING!!!!!! Definitely worth a buy of around $22-23.
KSP: More kills per hour than COD: Ghost
I enjoy both!! I expected ghosts to be horrible, but it just wasn't. You cant compare these 2 games though

But even battlefield 4 didnt even need to be released. From what i've played bf3 is basically the same but bf4 has some features from past battlefield games that wernt in bf3.

Indeed, lets all stick to the good old Return To Castle Wolfenstein, I kicked ass at that!

Indeed, lets all stick to the good old Return To Castle Wolfenstein, I kicked ass at that!

You think that needed to be released?! Im still loving my FPTTS's (First Person Table Top Shooters)!

Shooter games have this development cycle:

1. Release New game

2. Little patches

3. Repeat Steps 1-2 until the developer is greedy and ignorant

4. Do small upgrades to games and release them as new games

5. Repeat step 4 until the developer stops existing

What do you expect our whole economy is just that it encourages such company mentality

why build a great product,full of new stuph,original and stable/hard to brake when you can make something half baked unoriginal and blow its price up to a quality standart.

how it needs to be

"harder better faster stronger"

-daft punk
